channel.title: Real Runescape Leveling up help need please
channel.description: Would someone be kind enough to help me make leveling up the right speed like in the real runescape?

item.title: Real Runescape Leveling up help need please
item.dc:creator: @pu123_5k1ll3 pu123 5k1ll3
item.description:
@pu123_5k1ll3 wrote:

look for

if (FightType != 3)

under it should be a number*hitdiff. basicly that means whatever you hit you multiply it by the number and thats how much xp you get. now if you want to go for runescape it would go like

TotalExp = (double)(4 * hitDiff);
TotalExp = (double)(TotalExp * CombatExpRate);
addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), SkillID);

that means 4 multiplied by what you hit(example of 1) add xp=4xp which is the current rs xp rate you can change that to whatever number you want for example if its set to

TotalExp = (double)(10 * hitDiff); that means whatever you hit will be multiplied by 10 and the result is how much xp you get

Read full topic
